Instance.description: The situation to control one single diner. The state will get triggered by both the sim's behavior and the dining group status, which can get from the RestaurantDinerBackGroundSituation.

TunableTuple.name: _arrival_state
TunableTuple.description: The tuning for arrival state which will complete when the tuned interaction is run.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: _check_in_with_host_state
TunableTuple.description: The state tuning for when the Sims are checking in with the host at the restaurant (if there is one) to get a table.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: _eat_food_state
TunableTuple.description: The state tuning for when the Sims have received their food and are now chowing down on their meals.

TunableTuple.name: abandon_table_interaction
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that a Sim can run to release/abandon a table which will lead them to need to go back to the _CheckInWithHostState if they are going to get shown to another table.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TdescFragTag.name: interaction_target_tests
TdescFragTag.description:
A set of tests that the target of the completed interaction must pass in order for the interaction to be considered complete for the purposes of this state.
For example this should have a state test for Empty because a Sim is not done eating until their plate is empty.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: _eat_preroll_state
TunableTuple.description:
The state tuning for the state that will advance the Sims straight to the eat state during preroll.
This state should limit the Sims autonomy so that all they can do is get into a state that is appropriate for this state. For example running an interaction that sits the sim in their assigned chair so that when the curtain comes up you see the group sitting at the table.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: _leave_state
TunableTuple.description: The state tuning for when the Sims are done and about to leave the restaurant. This is the last thing they will do before the situation self destructs and the Sim is placed in the leave now situation which will have the Sim actually exit the lot. You do not need to tune behavior for them to leave the lot.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableTuple.name: _order_from_chef_state
TunableTuple.description: The state tuning for when a Sim needs to order from the chef directly instead of from a waiter/waitress.

TunableTuple.name: abandon_table_interaction
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that a Sim can run to release/abandon a table which will lead them to need to go back to the _CheckInWithHostState if they are going to get shown to another table.

This state should limit the Sims autonomy so that all they can do is get into a state that is appropriate for this state. For example running an interaction that sits the sim in their assigned chair so that when the curtain comes up you see the group sitting at the table.
